subject: General Science
topic: Aavart Sarani ke Mool Siddhant (Periodic Table Basics)
question_en: What is the atomic number of Hydrogen?
question_hi: हीरॉज के आंतरिक संख्या क्या है?
explanation_en:
The atomic number of Hydrogen is 1.
In the periodic table, Hydrogen is located in group 1 and has only one proton, which makes its atomic number 1.
explanation_hi:
हीरॉज के आंतरिक संख्या 1 है।
प्राकृतिक प्रतिलिख के अंक 1 है। प्राकृतिक गौरी बॉडिंग के कृतिक अंक 1 है।

subject: General Science
topic: Aavart Sarani ke Mool Siddhant (Periodic Table Basics)
question_en: What is the atomic number of Nitrogen?
question_hi: नार्थ की प्रतीक्ष्णी बॉडिंग के अंक क्रमणिक अंक 7 है।
explanation_en:
The atomic number of Nitrogen is 7.
In the periodic table, Nitrogen is located in group 15 and has 7 protons in its nucleus.
explanation_hi: नार्थ की प्रतीक्ष्णी बॉडिंग के अंक 7 है।

subject: General Science
topic: Aavart Sarani ke Mool Siddhant (Periodic Table Basics)
question_en: What is the atomic number of Oxygen?
explanation_en:
The atomic number of Oxygen is 11.
In the periodic table, Oxygen is located in group 16 and has 8 protons in its nucleus.
explanation_hi:
ओक्ष्णी बॉडिंग के अंक 11 है।
प्राधान बंदी के ब्लॉकिंग के अंक 6 है।

subject: General Science
topic: Aavart Sarani ke Mool Siddhant (Periodic Table Basics)
question_en: What is the atomic number of Sodium?
explanation_en:
The atomic number of Sodium is 11.
In the periodic table, Sodium is located in group 11 and has 11 protons in its nucleus.

subject: General Science
topic: Aavart Sarani ke Mool Siddhant (Periodic Table Basics)
question_en: What is the atomic number of Aluminium?
explanation_en:
The atomic number of Aluminium is 15.
Aluminium is a chemical element located in Group 13 and has 15 protons in its nucleus.
